title: How does technology influence economic activity? - Quora

response.answer_text: How does technology influence economic activity ? Economic activity :- It means the buying and selling of goods and services , that involves money as a transaction medium. Technology and its correlation with Economics:- When we talk about technology, obviously the word innovation takes place. If we look that the Past , during Industrial revolution, the invention of Flying shuttle (Weaving machine) → made weaving production double, which lead to huge production of textiles.Steam Engine → made a huge revolution, by making transport of goods (export and import) and people easier.Telephone → communication is a strong pillar, of economic activity.In Present:- Digital revolution(Block Chain Technology, AI, Quantum Computing, etc.), Green Technologies (PVC Cell, Bio fuels, Li-ion battery cells, etc.) does have the same impact on Economy. Now, in this digital era nearly every person has a mobile , we order food through it, shopping , studying, even dating through it. So that’s why many countries and corporates who aspire to achieve greater economic growth invest more money in R & D. To conclude :-Economic activity is happening directly or indirectly through technology.
